definitions.definition: the lower part of your face that moves when you open your mouth:
either of the two bones in your mouth that hold your teeth:
the mouth of a person or animal, especially a large and frightening animal:
examples: The lion opened its jaws and roared.

definitions.definition: something that opens and closes like the upper and lower parts of a mouth:
examples: His foot was caught in the jaws of the trap.

definitions.definition: to talk for a long time:
examples: He was jawing away to his girlfriend for hours on the phone.
